title: Daybreak fanart
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Fanart for Daybreak, one of my favorite canons on site. I have a headcanon that the sun-touched amalgams can form grotesque beasts, organizing beyond the usual largely structure-less blobs.

Content warning for very bright red.
